amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement, administer, or enforce the Davis-Bacon Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 51 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement, administer, or enforce the Davis-Bacon Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 241 (Roll no. 453).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 241 (Roll no. 453).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. King (IA).
